content.html: I wrote this 11 years ago. shkspr.mobi/blog/2011/01/o… I really wish more OAuth services would use the `expires_in` response. It would be great if you could authorise a service for a specified and limited amount of time.
content.value:
I wrote this 11 years ago.
shkspr.mobi/blog/2011/01/o…
I really wish more OAuth services would use the `expires_in` response. It would be great if you could authorise a service for a specified and limited amount of time.
